import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (

Shipping

Shipping: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}, {' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Cart Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty ): ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price)} ))} )}
); } export default PlaceOrderScreen
